title: 1 Bed Apt. close to Cal
posting_body: 2540 Benvenue provides studio and 1 bedroom apartments best suited for solo tenants and roommate groups of 2-3 individuals.
Benvenue is on a quiet street adjacent to the world-famous Telegraph Avenue in a primarily student neighborhood in Berkeley, just south of UC Berkeley campus.

Walkable to the UC, to public transit and BART, downtown shops and restaurants, greek life, and College Ave, this location is perfect for undergraduate students in the midst of their university life and studies.
Amenities include laundry in the building, private balconies, intercom delivery system, fiber-optic internet hookups (service not included), and available garage parking.
Visit our website for more info:
For all units: security deposit is 1.5x the monthly rent; utilities not included; units are unfurnished; no smoking and no pets.
1 year lease, but we can be flexible.
Email or call with some details about yourself for more information.
